category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IDSM_dsa_default_volume
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name of the local volume that will be used as the default volume for User and Group system objects receoved from a remote site. This volume will be used if the incoming User or Group object's default volume is set to a volume that does not exist at the receiving site. This is a site preference.
